passed_checks.check_name: Ensure From Alias are unique for multistage builds.
code_block:
# FROM super-sast, copy-paste the Dockerfile is better?

FROM ghcr.io/par-tec/super-sast as super-sast

FROM python:3.11.1-alpine as base_python
COPY --from=super-sast / /
# RUN apt-get update
ADD main.py /
ADD entrypoint.sh /

# install annotations tools, needed: Bandit, Checkov, Semgrep?
# RUN pip install -r /requirements.txt
RUN chmod +x /entrypoint.sh

ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]

    - name: python-bandit with code annotations
      uses: ioggstream/bandit-report-artifacts@v0.0.1
      with:
        # This is the path at which the your python project is located in you github repo.
        project_path: main.py

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure ACTIONS_ALLOW_UNSECURE_COMMANDS isn't true on environment variables

steps.name: Install
steps.run:
python --version
python -m pip install --upgrade pip
pip install -r requirements.txt pytest

PYTHONPATH=. pytest tests

steps.name: Test canary
steps.run: DUMMY_ANNOTATION=true python main.py tests/canary.py LICENSE tests/py2.py

code_block:
runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [ ubuntu-latest ]
        python-version: [ '3.7' ]
    name: Python ${{ matrix.python-version }} ${{ matrix.os }}

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Set up Python ${{ matrix.python-version }}
      uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      with:
        python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}

    - name: Install
      run: |-
        python --version
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt pytest

        PYTHONPATH=. pytest tests

    - name: Test canary
      env:
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      run: |-
        DUMMY_ANNOTATION=true python main.py tests/canary.py LICENSE tests/py2.py

passed_checks.check_name: Suspicious use of curl with secrets
